jobs_results.title: Développeur Mobile Android
jobs_results.description:
Le département Rossel Applications a pour mission la supervision et la prise en charge de l’ensemble des tâches de conception, de mise en œuvre, d’intégration et d’évolution des différents environnements applicatifs du Groupe Rossel (digital, publicité, contenu éditorial, marketing, finance, RH, support client, gestion d’abonnements, vente et distribution, …).

Selon les besoins fonctionnels et la stratégie d’entreprise, les différentes équipes composées de Chefs de Projets, architectes techniques, développeurs full-stack, web front ou mobile œuvrent main dans la main avec les équipes métiers afin d’apporter les solutions technologiques les plus innovantes et mieux adaptées aux enjeux des différents éditeurs et sociétés du Groupe (Le Soir, La Voix Du Nord, Sudinfo, Rossel Advertising, Rossel Est Media, RTL, Mediafin, Metro, Ciné Télé Revue, …).

Mission

Intégré au sein de la Mobile Factory Rossel, le développeur Android s’attelle à la prise en charge de demande de développement pour les différentes applications mobile du Groupe Rossel (Le Soir, La Voix Du Nord, RTL, Ciné Télé Revue, Metro, Paris-Normandie, …).

Sous La Responsabilité Du Product Owner Et Du Tech Lead Mobile, En S’appuyant Sur Une Approche Agile Et Sur La Méthodologie SCRUM, Il Participera Activement à La Réalisation Des Tâches Suivantes

– Analyser les demandes business, faire les retours de faisabilité, estimer les user stories et participer à la constitution du backlog produit.

– Réaliser des prototypes et maquettes facilitant l’évaluation et la validation des considérations UI et UX.

– Sur des itérations en moyenne de deux semaines prendre en charge le développement et le déploiement des travaux destinés à enrichir de manière continue le produit et livrer un incrément apportant une plus-value.

– Collaboration avec d’autres développeurs mobiles sur les deux plateformes (iOS et Android), testeurs, designers, PO et partenaires externes

– Garantir la mise en place et le maintien d’une architecture applicative pérenne et ouverte favorisant la réutilisation des composants et l’exposition de ceux-ci (vers l’interne et l’externe)

– Participation aux daily scrum meetings et autre meetings techniques liés aux applications mobiles

– analyse des crashlitycs et proposition de solutions

– Participer aux différentes phases de test (unitaires, fonctionnels, intégration, acceptance, automatisés)

– Créer et maintenir la documentation technique

– Ecriture de code clair et maintenable

– Assurer une veille technique et intégrer les dernières technologies spécifiques à Android.

– Etre force de proposition sur les évolutions de l’application et sur l’apport de services à valeurs ajoutée

Ce que nous recherchons

Titulaire d’un Bachelor, d’un master en informatique ou d’un diplôme ingénieur informaticien, vous bénéficiez d’une expérience de 3 ans minimum en développement Mobile Android

– curieux, aime travailler en équipe et partager sons avoir

– très bonne connaissance du langage Kotlin

– expérience avec le modèle de conception MVVM

– la connaissance de l’orienté objet

– le principe de clean Architecture

– maitrise Android Architecture Components (AAC)

– expérience avec Kotlin flow

– expérience avec Kotlin coroutines

– écriture de tests unitaires

– écriture de tests UI

– connaissance de la mise en production sur les store (Google Play console)

– familier avec la méthodologie Agile/Scrum

– déjà travaillé avec les librairies comme : Dagger, Koin, Kodein, Retrofit

– CI/CD : expérience avec un système d’intégration et de distribution continue

– connaissances dans la modularisation des applications

– développement de nouvelles fonctionnalités en respectant les bonnes pratiques et les guidelines Android

– connaissance de l’obfuscation en utilisant Proguard/Dexguard

– orienté solution, tu es capable de résoudre les bogues

– connaissance de Gradle

– bonne communication

– expérience avec Git et Gitflow et d’un service d’hébergement (bitbucket – gitlab – github – azuredevops)

– connaissance de JitPack Compose

Plus 

– implémentation et intégration de solutions publicitaires dans les app mobiles

– connaissance de KMP/KMM

jobs_results.title: Senior Android Developer
jobs_results.description:
Als Android Developer zal je verantwoordelijk zijn voor het onderhouden en uitbreiden van de huidige 4411 Android app. De app is reeds volledig in Kotlin geschreven (2% Java) en volgt in grote lijnen de best practices die volgens Google zijn gedefinieerd. Ook zijn we begonnen met de transitie naar Jetpack Compose, waarbij de nieuwe schermen volledig in Compose zijn geschreven en de oude onder handen worden genomen. Jij wordt medeverantwoordelijk voor het behouden van onze >99.75% "crash-free rate" en onze Play Store rating van 4.6, iets waar wij trots op zijn!

Wat verwachten we van jou?
• Je hebt minimaal 4 jaar ervaring met native Android development
• Je hebt de nodige ervaring met GIT
• Je bent een echte front-ender: je wordt enthousiast van een mooie UI en denkt actief mee over de UX terwijl je tegelijkertijd streeft naar een soepele gebruikerservaring
• Clean code principes maken jou blij en je helpt graag mee de modulaire architectuur van de app, waar de blauwdruk reeds van is gelegd, verder uit te bouwen. De code die je schrijft is goed leesbaar en makkelijk te testen.
• Je wordt enthousiast van nieuwe technieken en features binnen Android en volgt deze ook op. Deze uittesten en hun gebruiksnut binnen de app nagaan zie je als een uitdaging.
• Je hebt ervaring met CI/CD.
• Je spreekt vloeiend Kotlin, maar kan ook overweg met Java
• Je hebt een gedegen kennis van MVVM, clean architecture en async programming (dmv. Coroutines / Flow).
• Nice to have: Kennis om performante Jetpack Compose-code te schrijven en deze te verbeteren dmv. Baseline profiles en Compose performance inspection.
• Nice to have: Kennis van de volgende tools & libraries: Gradle build system, Jetpack libraries (ViewModel, (Compose) navigation, WorkManager, …), Retrofit, Room, Koin DI
• Nice to have: Kennis van Kotlin Multiplatform
• Nice to have: Ervaring met de volgende niet-Android tools: Figma, Bitrise, Lokalise, Firebase, Jira & Confluence.
• Je spreekt vloeiend Nederlands en beheerst het Engels & Frans

Wat bieden wij jou aan?
Je komt terecht in een hardwerkend team waar communicatie en teamspirit key zijn. Aan de hand van flexibele werktijden gepaard met een geweldige kantoorsfeer bieden wij jou hopelijk jouw nieuwe droomjob aan. Uiteraard is er de mogelijkheid om van thuis uit te werken, ook al wil je onze 'Last Thursday'-borrels zeker niet missen Daarnaast ontvang je nog eens ongelimiteerde toegang tot de 4411-diensten. Do we need to say more?

Interesse?

Ben je nog steeds enthousiast na het lezen van deze beschrijving of wil je graag een eerste kennismaking inplannen? Solliciteer via onderstaande knop en wie weet werk jij binnenkort mee aan dé grootste parkeerapplicatie van België.

jobs_results.title: Flutter Developer
jobs_results.description:
Job Description

Are you an experienced Flutter Developer eager to create innovative mobile applications? Join our team, where your passion for coding, testing, and delivering cutting-edge apps will make a real impact.
• As a Flutter Developer, you’ll be involved in every phase of the development lifecycle, ensuring high-quality and efficient code that enhances our platform’s functionality.
• This is an exciting opportunity to be part of a dynamic and fast-paced environment, driving innovation while working on meaningful projects.

Responsibilities
• Design, code, test, and deploy robust Flutter applications for Android and iOS platforms.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to participate in all phases of the development lifecycle.
• Diagnose and resolve performance issues to ensure optimal app functionality.
• Write clean, efficient, and well-structured code adhering to best practices.
• Stay updated with the latest technologies, tools, and trends in mobile development.
• Contribute to improving the development process and sharing knowledge with the team.

Skills
• At least 3+ years of building Android and/or iOS apps using Flutter in a professional environment.
• Proven experience with mobile app development and knowledge of well-known packages and plugins.
• Familiarity with reactive and functional programming, as well as common design patterns in mobile development.
• Solid understanding of versioning tools such as Git.
• Pride in writing clean, efficient code and taking responsibility for delivered work.

Hiring Team Member

Avula Srivalli

Recruitment Coordinator
• LinkedIn
• Mail

jobs_results.title: Mobile Developer (React Native)
jobs_results.description:
As a React Native Mobile Developer at Massive Media you will be part of a talented, young & dynamic team that builds highly scalable products used by millions.

We are seeking an experienced, dedicated, and well-organized Mobile Developer with relevant experience in React Native to join our team (60% Ghent-based - 40% flexible).

We believe that life is all about the people you meet. That's why we build platforms to bring millions of people together in a fun, simple and efficient way.

Our company is based in the city centre of Ghent, initially launched Netlog and is currently running Ablo and Twoo. This is a unique opportunity to be deeply involved in the growth and evolution of amazing and dynamic products, built on cool technology, by exceptional people.

About You
• Are you experienced in developing applications using React Native?
• Do you have knowledge of Objective C and/or Java (Android) ?
• Are you passionate about designing, building, and maintaining beautiful apps?
• Do you thrive in an agile and fast-paced development environment?
• Can you work in a multi-disciplinary team?
• Are you adaptable to a changing environment?
• Do the words excellence, passion and respect dominate your tag cloud?

If you answered "Yes!" to all of these questions, a job as Mobile Developer at Massive Media is a perfect fit for you. Apply now and become part of a young and dynamic team!

Here are a few perks we have in store for you:

- Competitive salary
- Full benefits, including healthcare benefits plan, group insurance, meal vouchers
- Monthly Happy Hours & yearly Team Event
- A great office in the city centre of Ghent with the possibility of working from home
- You’ll be working with smart people from all kinds of backgrounds. As a member of Match Group, you’ll benefit from extensive, world-class knowledge sharing.

Match Group is an Equal Opportunity Employer, committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace.

ABOUT MATCH GROUP:
Match Group (NASDAQ: MTCH) is a leading provider of dating products. We operate a portfolio of brands, including Tinder, Match, PlentyOfFish, OkCupid, OurTime, Meetic, Lovescout24, Pairs, Hawaya, each designed to increase our users' likelihood of finding a meaningful connection. Through our portfolio of trusted brands, we provide tailored products to meet the varying preferences of our users. We currently offer our dating products in 42 languages across more than 190 countries.

jobs_results.title: ANDROID ENGINEER
jobs_results.description:
Company Description

Yambla is a startup based in San Francisco and Belgium. We are revolutionizing the way companies innovate.

Even the largest companies have trouble innovating. Nokia, Kodak, BlackBerry and BlockBuster are just a few examples of thriving companies that went from hero to zero overnight due to a lack of innovation. It’s Yambla’s job to help companies stay ahead of the competition.

Here at Yambla we strongly believe employee engagement is the key to the success of any company, and it’s our mission to help companies build a culture of innovation by collecting ideas from employees, and turning them into value.

It’s a huge challenge and we can’t do this on our own – that’s why we need people like you!

Job Description

What you’ll be doing
• Imagine, implement, test, and iterate on new features
• Extending a mobile application that is used by some of the world’s largest brands
• Working in a diverse, dynamic environment that leverages multiple tools and languages
• Finding ways to remove obstacles, and weaknesses that slow you down

Qualifications
• Ability to pick any language or tool that is the right for the job and “run with it”
• You should have vast experience with Android
• An understanding of object-oriented programming and software design patterns
• Excellent analytical and problem solving skills
• Strong intra-team communication and ability to express ideas
• Have opinions on how things should be planned, implemented, and maintained
• Excels in a pragmatic team that wants the best tools, cleanest code, and best product

Nice to haves:
• Dedication to unit testing, code review and other quality-oriented practices
• Experience with design

Additional Information

Compensation & Perks:
• Competitive salary
• Flexible working hours
• Beers!

If this sounds like you could excel in this environment, let’s have a chat! - Drop us an email at hello@yambla.com.

jobs_results.title: Android Software Developer at  Zedelgem
jobs_results.description:
Functieomschrijving:
• As Android Software Developer you create software which runs on a custom Android Display platform that enables user control functionality of agricultural and other off-road commercial vehicles.
• You must have the ability to generate efficient software code, based on written and verbal specifications.
• As Android Software Developer you are responsible for the development of Android UI functions for Vehicle Applications.
• You perform tests and performance-checks, and debug all software.

Profielomschrijving:
• You have a Bachelor Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or Software Engineering.
• As Android Software Developer you have minimum ⚠ years professional experience.
• This position also requires a minimum experience of ⚠ years with Java programming, ⚠ years with Android application software development, ⚠ year with CAN (Controller Area Network) and ⚠ months using SVN and Git for source code management.
• You have experience using VL&VD Experts tools as well as V-Model and/or Agile software development processes.
• As Android Software Developer you have a strong virtual team-oriented mentality, promoting collaboration, synergies and collective decisions.
• You are good at analysing, designing and developing complex solutions.
• You have outstanding problem solving abilities.
• International travel a few times per year does not pose a problem to you.
• As Android Software Developer you have excellent verbal and written communication skills in English.

Aanbod:

KV Team offers an attractive remuneration package.

Interesse?
Does the job of Android Software Developer with KV Team in Zedelgem appeal to you? Then leave your CV and motivational letter on our application page 🔗
